item.description:
This is a must-attend event for Ron Paul supporters in New Hampshire! Join the Coalition for New Hampshire Taxpayers at their annual picnic in Hopkinton, and make Dr. Paul the winner of the first NH straw poll.

According to an WMUR poll released yesterday, an astounding 57% of likely GOP voters "have no idea" who they'll support in the primary--which means they're looking for an alternative to Rudy McRomney. A poll win like this for Dr. Paul *will* get their attention.

Bonus: Rand Paul, son of the good doctor, will be attending the picnic--and the apple didn't fall far from the tree. So come meet another Paul with a passion for liberty, and show the Paul family (again) that New Hampshire is where liberty lives.

$15 per person (paid to CNHT), all you can eat, kids 12 and under free.

Details here.
item.name: CNHT Picnic--and Straw Poll!
